TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit LinqDataSourceDesigner extends System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceDesigner

summary.span: 在視覺化設計工具 (Visual Designer) 中，為 控制項提供設計階段支援。

span.span: Provides design-time support in a visual designer for the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在視覺化設計工具中，當您切換到設計工具檢視 (例如**設計**Visual Studio 中的檢視])、控制項標記的剖析。In a visual designer, when you switch to a designer view (such as **Design** view in Visual Studio]), the control markup is parsed. 在設計介面上，然後會建立控制項的設計階段版本。A design-time version of the control is then created on the design surface. 當您切換至來源檢視時，則會將設計階段控制項保存為 Web 網頁的標記。When you switch to source view, the design-time control is persisted as the markup for the Web page. 類別提供設計階段支援視覺化設計工具中的控制項。The class provides design-time support for the control in a visual designer.

para.span: 若要在設計階段動作清單功能表提供衍生類別中的命令，您必須覆寫屬性。

span.span: To provide commands in a derived class for the action list menu at design time, you must override the property.

para.span: 這個屬性，傳回自訂物件，其中包含衍生自項目物件。

span.span: For this property, return a custom object that contains items that derive from the object.

para.span: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 類別。

span.span: For more information, see the class.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Overrides ReadOnly Property ActionLists As DesignerActionListCollection

summary.span: 取得用於在設計階段建立動作清單功能表的項目清單。

span.span: Gets a list of items that are used to create an action list menu at design time.

value.span: 包含動作清單項目的集合。

span.span: A collection that contains the action list items.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Overrides ReadOnly Property CanConfigure As Boolean
public: virtual property bool CanConfigure { bool get(); };

summary.span: 取得值，這個值表示設計主應用程式是否可以呼叫 方法。

span.span: Gets a value that indicates whether the method can be called by the design host.

value.span: 如果可以呼叫 方法，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if the method can be called; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以呼叫方法，如果屬性相關聯的控制實作介面。The method can be called if the property of the associated control implements the interface. 在此情況下，屬性值是`true`。In that case, the property value is `true`. 如果屬性是`true`、**設定資料來源**功能表項目會顯示在**LinqDataSource 工作**視覺化設計工具介面上針對關聯控制項的功能表。If the property is `true`, the **Configure Data Source** menu item is displayed in the **LinqDataSource Tasks** menu of the associated control on the visual designer surface. 選取此項目時，**設定資料來源**啟動精靈。When this item is selected, the **Configure Data Source** wizard is started.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Overrides ReadOnly Property CanRefreshSchema As Boolean
public: virtual property bool CanRefreshSchema { bool get(); };

summary.span: 取得值，這個值表示設計主應用程式是否可以呼叫 方法。

span.span: Gets a value that indicates whether the method can be called by the design host.

value.span: 如果可以呼叫 方法，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if the method can be called; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以呼叫方法，如果下列所有條件都都成立：The method can be called if all the following conditions are true: - 屬性相關聯的控制實作介面。The property of the associated control implements the interface. - 屬性包含的值。The property contains a value. 如果這些條件都成立，屬性值是`true`。If these conditions are true, the property value is `true`. 如果是`true`、**重新整理結構描述**功能表項目會顯示在**LinqDataSource 工作**視覺化設計工具介面上針對關聯控制項的功能表。If the is `true`, the **Refresh Schema** menu item is displayed in the **LinqDataSource Tasks** menu of the associated control on the visual designer surface.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance void Configure() cil managed

summary.span: 在設計主應用程式中，啟動資料來源組態精靈。

span.span: Launches the data source configuration wizard in the design host.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法啟動**設定資料來源**視覺化設計工具介面上的精靈。The method starts the **Configure Data Source** wizard on the visual designer surface. 方法時，會呼叫**設定資料來源**功能表項目上選取了 **LinqDataSource 工作**相關聯的功能表控制項。The method is called when the **Configure Data Source** menu item is selected on the **LinqDataSource Tasks** menu of the associated control. **設定資料來源**功能表項目出現在**LinqDataSource 工作**功能表時屬性是`true`。The **Configure Data Source** menu item appears on the **LinqDataSource Tasks** menu when the property is `true`.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ ContextTypeName { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定型別的名稱，該型別所包含之屬性的值具有您要擷取的資料。

span.span: Gets or sets the name of the type that contains the property whose value has the data that you want to retrieve.

value.span: 要從中擷取資料的類別名稱。

span.span: The name of the class to retrieve data from.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ Delete { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定刪除作業的值。

span.span: Gets or sets a value for the delete operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在執行個體，設定此屬性沒有任何作用。In a instance, setting this property has no effect. 這個屬性會遮蔽關聯控制項中的屬性，僅供內部使用。This property shadows a property in the associated control, and is intended for internal use only.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool EnableDelete { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定值，這個值表示是否可以在執行階段時從資料來源刪除資料列。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether rows can be deleted from the data source at run time.

value.span: 如果對關聯的 執行個體使用者啟用刪除作業，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if the delete operation is enabled for users of the associated instance; otherwise, .

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool EnableInsert { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定值，這個值表示是否可以在執行階段時將資料列插入資料來源中。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether rows can be inserted into the data source at run time.

value.span: 如果對關聯的 執行個體使用者啟用插入作業，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if the insert operation is enabled for users of the associated instance; otherwise, .

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool EnableUpdate { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定值，這個值表示是否可以在執行階段時更新資料來源中的資料列。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether rows in the data source can be updated at run time.

value.span: 如果對關聯的 執行個體使用者啟用更新作業，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if the update operation is enabled for users of the associated instance; otherwise, .

param.name: preferSilent
param.span: 如果要隱藏所有資料來源事件，直到重新整理結構描述為止，則為 。

span.span: to suppress all data source events until the schema is refreshed.

summary.span: 重新整理基礎資料來源的結構描述。

span.span: Refreshes the schema from the underlying data source.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 設計主機呼叫方法才是`true`。The design host calls the method only if is `true`.
